author: Robert Mahoney
title: Journalists need to be protected during the pandemic
description: Journalists must stay safe now because we are going to need them even more later.
content: Pictures of a CTV journalist trying to observe "social distancing" by strapping his microphone to a hockey stick may have prompted smiles at a very Canadian answer to coronavirus reporting. But journalists' safety in this time of unprecedented pestilence and … [+5767 chars]
